confirm(java.lang.String).Description: Handle a confirmation response from the user.

ClassDesc: Public class for handling JavaScript prompt requests. The WebChromeClient will receive a @B_android#webkit#WebChromeClient#onJsPrompt_E@ call with a JsPromptResult instance as a parameter. This parameter is used to return the result of this user dialog prompt back to the WebView instance. The client can call cancel() to cancel the dialog or confirm() with the user's input to confirm the dialog.
